title: Person Of Interest - Machine Questioning
author: Acorbyse
comment:
"And how will I remember you?'

Goddammit Machine. 😭😭😭
Aw that instant regret. You can feel his panic when he kills his creation and realizes it's not what he wants.
One of the best scenes in the show. The Finch-Machine scenes are truly the cream of the crop of POI. Brilliant writing, brilliant acting.
It has point. Even with people, the best ones are not those that have led perfect lives, they are the ones who have made mistakes, learned from them, and vowed to do better.
i was looking for this scene for a while now, i wish good upon u sir and thank you
